title: Is there any format available for admission under the MP quota at Kendriya Vidyalaya? - Quora

response.answer_text: Regarding MP quota for admission in kendriya vidyalaya every MP is authorised to admit 10 students in an academic year and for this government of India has issued 10 tickets for each and every MP if if any MP entrusted in in admission of a child in his constituency in any kendriya vidyalaya then he has to write the name address mobile number at sector on that ticket and he will send it to two speaker Lok Sabha then speaker will send it to HRD and then HRD has to order to commissioner kendriya vidyalaya sangathan to admit that child in that class in particular kendriya vidyalaya except in class 10th and 12th. MP can't write two principal kendriya vidyalaya or any other authority to admit a child on his simple letterhead he has to use that ticket.
